1948 Arab-Israeli War.Date: 15 May 1948 - 10 March 1949 | (9 months, 3 weeks and 2 days)
1948 Arab-Israeli War.Location: Former British Mandate of Palestine, Sinai Peninsula, southern Lebanon
1948 Arab-Israeli War.Result: Israeli victory | Jordanian partial victory | Palestinian Arab defeat | Egyptian defeat | Arab League strategic failure | 1949 Armistice Agreements
1948 Arab-Israeli War.Territorial | changes: Israel keeps the area allotted to it by the Partition Plan and captures ≈60% of the area allotted to Arab state; Jordanian rule of the West Bank, Egyptian occupation of the Gaza Strip
1948 Arab-Israeli War: Raising the Ink Flag at Umm Rashrash (Eilat).jpg | Captain Avraham "Bren" Adan raising the Ink Flag at Umm Rashrash (a site now in Eilat), marking the end of the war
